title: User Journey Reporting Event metrics

xdm:EnteredJourneyInstance.title: Entered Journey
xdm:EnteredJourneyInstance.description: set to 1 when a journey instance is created

xdm:ExitedJourneyInstance.title: Exited journey
xdm:ExitedJourneyInstance.description: set to 1 when a journey instance is flagged as ended

xdm:ErrorInJourneyInstance.title: Error in Journey Instance
xdm:ErrorInJourneyInstance.description: set to 1 when an error is raised in a journey instance

xdm:ErrorInEventProcessing.title: Eroor in step processing
xdm:ErrorInEventProcessing.description: set to 1 when an error occurs during an event processing meaning, during a step processing

xdm:ErrorInActionExecution.title: Error in action execution
xdm:ErrorInActionExecution.description: set to 1 when an error occurs during an action execution

xdm:ErrorInJumpActionExecution.title: Error in jump action
xdm:ErrorInJumpActionExecution.description: set to 1 when an error occurs during the jump action execution

xdm:ErrorInEnrichment.title: Error in enrichment
xdm:ErrorInEnrichment.description: set to 1 when an error occurs during enrichment

xdm:ExecutedEvent.title: Event processed
xdm:ExecutedEvent.description: set to 1 when an event as triggered a transition in a journey instance

xdm:ExecutedAction.title: Action executed
xdm:ExecutedAction.description: set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

xdm:ExecutedFlowControl.title: Flow control executed
xdm:ExecutedFlowControl.description: set to 1 when an action is executed successfully in a journey instance

xdm:ExecutedJumpAction.title: Executed jump action
xdm:ExecutedJumpAction.description: set to 1 when an jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance

xdm:ExecutedEnrichment.title: Enrichment made successfully
xdm:ExecutedEnrichment.description: set to 1 when an enrichment is executed successfully in a journey instance

xdm:JumpToJourney.title: Jump action executed successfully
xdm:JumpToJourney.description: set to 1 when a jump action is executed successfully in a journey instance
